verses.verse: Why do the nations <S%H1471><s%> rage, <S%H7283><s%> and the peoples <S%H3816><s%> plot <S%H1897><s%> a vain thing? <S%H7385><s%>

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> take a stand, <S%H3320><s%> and the rulers <S%H7336><s%> take counsel <S%H3245><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and against his Anointed, <S%H4899><s%> saying,
"Let <S%H5423><s%>'s break their bonds <S%H4147><s%> apart, <S%H5423><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> their cords from us. <S%H4147><s%>"
He who sits <S%H3427><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%> will laugh. <S%H7832><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> will have them in derision. <S%H3932><s%>
Then he will speak <S%H1696><s%> to them in his anger, <S%H639><s%> and terrify <S%H926><s%> them in his wrath: <S%H2740><s%>
"Yet I have set <S%H5258><s%> my King <S%H4428><s%> on my holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>"
I will tell <S%H5608><s%> of the decree. <S%H2706><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> "You are my son. Today <S%H3117><s%> I have become your father. <S%H3205><s%>

Ask <S%H7592><s%> of me, <S%H5414><s%> and I will give the nations <S%H1471><s%> for your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> the uttermost parts <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for your possession. <S%H272><s%>
You shall break <S%H7489><s%> them with a rod <S%H7626><s%> of iron. <S%H1270><s%> You shall dash them in pieces <S%H5310><s%> like a potter <S%H3335><s%>'s vessel. <S%H3627><s%>"
Now therefore be wise, <S%H7919><s%> you kings. <S%H4428><s%> Be instructed, <S%H3256><s%> you judges <S%H8199><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with fear, <S%H3374><s%> and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> with trembling. <S%H7461><s%>

Give sincere homage <S%H5401><s%> to the Son, <S%H1248><s%> lest he be angry, <S%H599><s%> and you perish <S%H6><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> for his wrath <S%H639><s%> will soon be <S%H4592><s%> kindled. <S%H1197><s%> Blessed <S%H835><s%> are all those who take refuge in him. <S%H2620><s%>
